verses.name: Genesis 47:1
verses.text: Then Joseph came and told Pharaoh, and said, My father and my brethren, and their flocks, and their herds, and all that they have, are come out of the land of Canaan; and, behold, they are in the land of Goshen.

verses.name: Genesis 47:2
verses.text: And he took some of his brethren, even five men, and presented them unto Pharaoh.

verses.name: Genesis 47:3
verses.text: And Pharaoh said unto his brethren, What is your occupation? And they said unto Pharaoh, Thy servants are shepherds, both we, and also our fathers.
